title: Bunny Berigan & The Rhythm Makers 1936 & 1938 (2 CD) Jas
description:
BUNNY BERIGAN AND THE RHYTHM MAKERS

These two CDs cover the three sessions Bunny Berigan And His Rhythm Makers recorded for NBC's Thesaurus series of radio transcriptions. All were recorded at Victor's New York studios.

Volume 1, 1936 & 1938 Sing! Sing! Sing!

01. Take My Word
02. Rendezvous With A Dream
03. On A Cocoanut Island
04. On The Beach At Bali Bali
05. But Definitely
06. Sing!  Sing!  Sing!
07. I'm An Old Cowhand
08. Empty Saddles
09. On Your Toes
10. Did I Remember?
11. San Francisco
12. I Can't Escape From You
13. I Can Pull A Rabbit Out Of A Hat
14. When I'm With You
15. Dardanella
16. When Did You Leave Heaven?
17. You're Not The Kind
18. You've Gotta Eat Your Spinach, Baby
19. Sweet Misery Of Love
20. That's A Plenty

Bunny Berigan, Ralph Muzzillo, Harry Preble (tp), George Mazza and/or Artie Foster (tb), Unknown possibly Artie Shaw, Carl Swift (cl & as), Artie Drelinger, Unknown (ts), Joe Lippman (p), Morty Stuhlmaker (b), Bill Flanagan (d), Peggy Lawson (vcl); July 20, 1936

21. Now It Can Be Told
22. My Walking Stick
23. Wacky Dust
24. And So Forth
25. Flat Foot Floogie

Volume 2, 1938 Devil's Holiday!

01. Shanghai Shuffle
02. I Got A Guy
03. Tonight Will Live
04. Cowboy From Brooklyn
05. Devil's Holiday
06. Easy To Find, Hard To Lose
07. The Wearing Of The Green
08. The Pied Piper
09. Sunday
10. Frankie And Johnny
11. Don't Wake Up My Heart
12. I'll Always Be In Love With You
13. I Never Knew
14. (How To Make Love In) Ten Easy Lessons
15. Black Bottom

Bunny Berigan, Steve Lipkins, Irving Goodman (tp), Nat Lobovsky, Ray Coniff (tb), Mike Doty, Joe Dixon (cl & as), George Auld, Clyde Rounds (ts), Joe Bushkin (p), Dick Wharton (g), Hank Wayland (b), Johnny Blowers (d), Ruth Gaylor, Dick Wharton (vcl); June 27, 1938

16. There's A Brand New Picture In My Picture Frame
17. There's Something About An Old Love
18. Small Fry
19. Sing You Sinners
20. Will You Remember Tonight Tomorrow?
21. So Help Me
22. Meet The Beat Of My Heart
23. T'Aint So, Honey, T'Aint So
24. Where In The World?
25. Peg O' My Heart
26. Hi-Yo, Silver!
27. Mahogany Hall Stomp

Same Personnel as above except Buddy Rich (d) replaces Johnny Blowers; August 8 & 9, 1938

1990 (Vol. 1) & 1992 (Vol. 2) Jass Records
